seo.title: 5SOLO ï¿½ Five disciplines. One outcome.
seo.description: 5SOLO unites development, design, SEO, media and care leaders to ship revenue-ready websites in days, not months.

hero.title:
Five experts.
One result.
hero.subtitle: Development, design, SEO, media and ongoing care operating as one senior squad. We launch conversion-ready experiences in under two weeks.

about.label: Who we are
about.title: Five soloists in sync
about.text: 5SOLO brings engineering, design, SEO, media and lifecycle care into one tightly run studio. We map the strategy, build the product-ready website and stay to optimise every touchpoint.

services.label: Services
services.title: One studio. Five specialist tracks.
services.subtitle: Each track is led by a senior practice lead and reinforced by the rest of the collective so you never lose velocity.

items.title: Solo Dev
items.tldr: Launch-ready engineering for ambitious SaaS and product teams.
whatWeDo: Technical architecture for scalable Next.js 14 apps
Integrations with analytics, billing and internal APIs
Automated testing, staging and observability pipelines
benefits: Core Web Vitals budgets met from sprint one
Reusable component library documented for your team
Transparent delivery rhythm with release notes each week

faq.question: Can you work with an existing backend or design system?
faq.answer: Yes. We audit what is in place, map dependencies and extend your stack without reinventing what already works.

faq.question: How do you ensure handover after launch?
faq.answer: We provide infrastructure diagrams, runbooks and live walkthroughs so your internal team can own the roadmap.

items.title: Solo Design
items.tldr: Brand, UI and UX crafted to convert across devices and languages.
whatWeDo: Brand identity refresh tuned for digital channels
UX flows, wireframes and design systems in Figma
Accessible motion, microcopy and illustration guidelines
benefits: Consistent visuals across marketing, product and sales assets
Content-first layouts with localisation baked in
Design tokens and components synced with engineering

faq.question: Do you handle copy and localisation?
faq.answer: We collaborate with your in-house writers or bring our partners to craft messaging for every market you serve.

faq.question: Can we keep iterating after launch?
faq.answer: Yes. We ship a testing backlog with hypotheses and run paired design sprints to evolve the experience.

items.title: Solo SEO
items.tldr: Search, structural and content strategy tied to revenue goals.
whatWeDo: Technical audits covering crawl, speed and schema
Keyword journey maps per persona and funnel stage
Editorial calendar and brief templates for writers
benefits: Priority backlog aligned with product and marketing plans
Dashboards tracking leading indicators, not vanity metrics
Cross-team rituals to keep SEO integrated post launch

faq.question: Do you work with existing content teams?
faq.answer: We plug into your editors, deliver briefs and QA outputs so every piece meets technical and brand standards.

faq.question: How fast can we see impact?
faq.answer: We combine quick technical wins with long-term plays, reporting on leading signals within the first month.

items.title: Solo Media
items.tldr: Campaign-ready creative, motion and social assets with one voice.
whatWeDo: Launch concepts, moodboards and copy for key campaigns
Motion design, screen recordings and explainers
Adaptive assets for paid, organic and partner channels
benefits: Every channel launches with on-brand visuals on day one
Short feedback loops with collaborative reviews
Performance insights to iterate creative with data

faq.question: Can you support ongoing content production?
faq.answer: We create reusable templates, train your team and stay available for high-impact drops.

faq.question: Do you work with external media buyers?
faq.answer: Yes. We align on briefs, specs and testing cadence with any partner agency you already trust.

items.title: Solo Care
items.tldr: Post-launch optimisation, analytics and retention programmes.
whatWeDo: Instrumentation of product and marketing analytics
benefits: Shared dashboards with goals, alerts and ownership
Prioritised backlog of experiments and CRO ideas
Customer service playbooks and training material

faq.question: How do retainers work?
faq.answer: We plan in quarterly OKRs with monthly sprints so you always know what is shipping and why.

faq.question: Can we involve our in-house support team?
faq.answer: We pair with your CX leads, set up documentation workflows and coach the team through new releases.

offer.label: Bonus
offer.title: Free managed hosting for 12 months
offer.subtitle: New full-site clients get Vercel Pro hosting on us. Zero surprise bills while we optimise your launch.
bullets: Up to 500k monthly visits and 1 TB bandwidth included
Migration support when you outgrow the included plan
offer.footnote: After the first year we help you choose the right plan or migrate to your infrastructure.

cases.label: Case studies
cases.title: Recent launch sprints
cases.subtitle: We partner with SaaS, healthcare and media teams that need a senior production crew.

items.name: GrowthOS
items.summary: Subscription onboarding hub rebuilt for revenue operations.
items.result: 12-day rebuild with embedded analytics and billing automation.

detail.heroSubtitle: We turned a fragmented onboarding journey into a guided product experience tied to revenue goals.

sections.title: Challenge
body: Enterprise prospects had to wait for manual onboarding and spreadsheets before seeing value.
Sales, success and product teams worked from different data, hurting activation goals.

sections.title: Solution
body: We rebuilt the onboarding flow as modular Next.js journeys with role-based content.
Connected CRM, billing and product analytics so the revenue team sees live health scores.

sections.title: Impact
body: Time-to-value dropped below one week for new accounts.
Sales reps demo with real activation data and automate success check-ins.

items.name: Helix Labs
items.summary: Biotech storytelling site with dynamic data visualisation.
items.result: Investor-ready narrative supported by live scientific evidence and compliance workflows.

detail.heroTitle: Helix Labs closed their Series B with a data-rich site
detail.heroSubtitle: The marketing, research and legal teams needed one platform to explain complex science and capture inbound interest.

sections.title: Challenge
body: Scientific content sat in PDFs and internal tools, making it hard to explain outcomes to investors.
Compliance reviews delayed campaign launches because every edit needed a fresh legal pass.

sections.title: Solution
body: Structured CMS models let scientists update claims with required references and approvals.
Interactive visualisations help non-technical audiences grasp the platform in under a minute.

sections.title: Impact
body: Marketing runs investor and talent campaigns from one source of truth.
Legal approvals now happen inside the CMS workflow, cutting revision time in half.

items.name: Atlas Media
items.summary: High-volume campaign engine for a global media studio.
items.result: Six tailored landing variations produced per week with automated QA and analytics.

detail.heroTitle: Atlas Media scaled personalised campaigns without adding headcount
detail.heroSubtitle: We built a component-driven system so the media team can launch, test and learn across markets in days.

sections.title: Challenge
body: Regional teams depended on a central dev squad, creating backlog bottlenecks.
QA struggled to keep up with localisation and compliance requirements.

sections.title: Solution
body: Composable content blocks power localisation without touching code.
Automated checks cover brand, accessibility and tracking before each release.

sections.title: Impact
body: Campaigns launch in hours, not weeks, with clear experimentation history.
Revenue teams see performance in real time and request iterations with data.

portfolio.label: Highlights
portfolio.title: A sample of our launch sprints
portfolio.subtitle: Explore how we combine strategy, design, engineering and media to deliver outcomes fast.

testimonials.label: Testimonials
testimonials.title: Teams that ship with 5SOLO
testimonials.subtitle: Founders, marketing leaders and product owners rely on us when they need senior execution without adding headcount.

client1.quote: We signed our first enterprise client two weeks after launch. Tracking, copy and the sales deck were ready on day one.
client1.name: Lena H.

client2.quote: Design and development moved in lockstep. Every sprint delivered a usable increment to demo to investors.
client2.name: Ilya T.

client3.quote: They handled localisation, SEO migration and success enablement in one motion. Support KPIs climbed within the first month.
client3.name: Marina P.

cta.label: Turnkey launch
cta.title: MVP-ready website in 10 days
cta.subtitle: Kick off within 48 hours. Fixed scope, transparent pricing and a senior squad on every task.

contact.label: Contact
contact.title: Tell us about your launch
contact.subtitle: Share goals, integrations and timeline. We respond within one business day.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This policy explains how 5SOLO Studio collects, uses and protects personal data when you interact with our website, portfolio and services.

sections.title: Data we collect
body: Contact form details you submit: name, email, phone (optional) and project message.
Usage information such as device, browser and pages visited, captured through privacy-friendly analytics.
Transactional data if you become a client, including billing details and contract records.

sections.title: How we use data
body: To reply to project enquiries and prepare proposals.
To provide, maintain and improve our services, infrastructure and security.
To meet legal obligations and keep accurate business records.

sections.title: Legal bases
body: We process contact form data on the basis of legitimate interest to respond to your request.
We rely on contractual necessity when delivering services you have commissioned.
Where required, we request your consent before enabling optional analytics or marketing cookies.

sections.title: Retention and security
body: Project enquiries are kept for up to 24 months unless we start a working relationship.
Client records are stored for the duration of the engagement and legal retention periods.
We use modern hosting, encryption in transit and strict access controls to protect your information.

sections.title: Your rights
body: You can request access, correction or deletion of your personal data at any time.
To exercise your rights under GDPR or CCPA, contact privacy@5solo.studio.
We will respond within 30 days and work with you to resolve any concerns.

sections.title: Contact
body: Email privacy@5solo.studio for privacy questions, data requests or compliance enquiries.

terms.title: Terms of Use
terms.intro: These terms govern your access to the 5SOLO Studio website and the services we provide. By working with us you agree to these conditions.

sections.title: Scope of services
body: We deliver strategy, design, engineering, SEO, media and care services as described in agreed proposals.
Any changes to scope, timing or deliverables will be documented and approved in writing.

sections.title: Client responsibilities
body: Provide timely access to stakeholders, assets and systems required to perform the work.
Review and approve deliverables within mutually agreed feedback windows.

sections.title: Fees and payment
body: Invoices are issued according to milestone or retainer schedules defined in the proposal.
Payments are due within 15 days unless different terms are stated. Late payments may pause work.

sections.title: Intellectual property
body: Upon full payment you receive ownership of final deliverables created specifically for you.
We retain the right to reference non-confidential work in our portfolio unless you request otherwise.

sections.title: Confidentiality
body: Each party agrees to protect confidential information shared during the engagement.
We sign NDAs on request and handle sensitive data according to industry best practice.

sections.title: Liability
body: We provide services with reasonable skill and care. Our liability is limited to the fees paid for the affected work.
We are not liable for indirect, incidental or consequential damages arising from the engagement.

sections.title: Termination
body: Either party may terminate the agreement with 14 days written notice if the other party materially breaches the terms and fails to cure the breach.
Upon termination you are responsible for work completed to date and any committed third-party costs.

sections.title: Governing law
body: These terms are governed by the laws of the United Kingdom unless stated otherwise in the proposal.
Disputes will be resolved through good faith negotiation before considering arbitration or courts.

sections.title: Contact
body: Email legal@5solo.studio with questions about these terms or to request a signed agreement.
